problem_text: What locally compact groups satisfy the following condition: the product of any two closed subgroups is also a closed subgroup? Abelian groups with this property were described in (Yu. N. Mukhin, Math. Notes, 8 (1970), 755–760). Yu. N. Mukhin
answer: Such groups are described (W. Herfort, K. H. Hofmann, F. G. Russo, Adv. Math., 390 (2021), 107894).
